pageProps.title: English intermediate notes
pageProps.content:
Here are my notes from an intermediate English course I am going through. Each header is a separate topic.


### Welcome to the jungle
- lucky charm
- the conference is due to start in 10 minutes
- I'm looking forward (or look forward for more formal communication) to taking it easy this weekend


### Miscellaneous
- go with the flow: relax and let it be.
